/* SupplyRec-Mapper.copyInfoToSupResume */
insert into sup_resume (supres_no, sup_no, supres_name, supres_bir, supres_email, supres_tel, supres_addr, supres_pic) select sup_resume_seq.nextval, resume.* from (select c.sup_no, a.name, b.ind_bir, a.email, a.tel, b.ind_addr, a.picture from member a, ind_member b, supply_rec c where a.id=b.ind_id and a.id=c.ind_id and a.id=#{indId} and c.sup_no=#{supNo}) resume

/* SupplyRec-Mapper.copyEducationToSupResEdu */
insert into sup_res_edu (supedu_no, sup_no, supedu_dep, supedu_name, supedu_major, supedu_score, supedu_status, supedu_sdate, supedu_edate) select sup_res_edu_seq.nextval, edu.* from ( select b.sup_no, a.edu_dep, a.edu_name, a.edu_major, a.edu_score, a.edu_status, a.edu_sdate, a.edu_edate from education a, supply_rec b where a.ind_id=b.ind_id and a.ind_id=#{indId} and b.sup_no=#{supNo}) edu

/* SupplyRec-Mapper.copyCareerToSupResCrr */
insert into sup_res_crr (supcrr_no, sup_no, supcrr_sec, supcrr_cor, supcrr_job, supcrr_pos, supcrr_sdate, supcrr_edate) select sup_res_crr_seq.nextval, crr.* from ( select b.sup_no, a.crr_sector, a.crr_corname, a.crr_job, a.crr_position, a.crr_sdate, a.crr_edate from career a, supply_rec b where a.ind_id=b.ind_id and a.ind_id=#{indId} and b.sup_no=#{supNo}) crr

/* SupplyRec-Mapper.copyCertificateToSupResCer */
insert into sup_res_cer (supcer_no, sup_no, supcer_host, supcer_name, supcer_sdate, supcer_edate) select sup_res_cer_seq.nextval, cer.* from ( select b.sup_no, a.cer_host, a.cer_name, a.cer_sdate, a.cer_edate from certificate a, supply_rec b where a.ind_id=b.ind_id and a.ind_id=#{indId} and b.sup_no=#{supNo}) cer
mapper.select: select a.*, b.ind_id from sup_resume a, supply_rec b where a.sup_no = b.sup_no and a.sup_no=#{supNo}
select a.*, (select stat_name from status b where b.stat_no=a.supedu_status and b.stat_col='EDU_STATUS') as "STR_STATUS" from sup_res_edu a where sup_no=#{supNo} order by a.supedu_sdate
select * from sup_res_crr where sup_no=#{supNo} order by supcrr_edate
select * from sup_res_cer where sup_no=#{supNo} order by supcer_sdate
select * from sup_res_let where sup_no=#{supNo} order by suplet_no asc
